About Me

Let me tell you my story...

Biography

My name's Ashraful Tauhid, born in 22nd September of 1995. With the advancement from a giant cellular phone to smartphones, I grew up. But one thing remained the same all along and that is the fascination towards technology. From the day I played my first ever video game (DX-Ball) I was determined to pursue my study in technology. Just like that I followed through my dream untill now.

I completed my Secondary School Certificate (SSC) from Cantonment Public School, Momenshahi with a GPA of 5.0/5.0 in 2012 and my Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) from Notre Dame College, Dhaka with a GPA of 5.0/5.0 in 2014. I graduated in December of 2018 from Bangladesh University of Professionals (BUP) in Information and Communication Engineering (ICE) with a CGPA of 3.71/4.0. I received BUP scholarship as well as BUP stipend during my stay at BUP for excellence in semester results based on GPA.

Currently, I'm preparing myself for my masters hopefully in information security or closely entitled field of studies. Information security and Human-Computer Interactions are the two of my most fascinated subjects to study in because of their salient impacts on people's life.

Dev programming

Projects

From the sophomore year of my undergrad, I've been into dev programming. I've developed as much as 6 projects for windows and 4 projects for android. One of my team's app idea also got listed in the top 500 apps in a contest name EATL app content. Some of the projects were chat-bot, pedometer and calorie counter, controlling windows tools with voice et cetera.

Research

Interest and Experience

My primary research interest is security of information technology. I'm also highly motivated to work in the field of IoT, Cyber-Physical Systems and Human-Computer Interactions.
So far I've published one paper in a journal named Journal of Information Security on image steganography and another paper on Cyber-Physical Systems is under review in a journal. My thesis of undergrad was also on image steganography.

Hobbies

Video games, Music, Traveling

I'm more or less of a try-hard player on fortnite. Check me out, IGN: Ashraful Tauhid.
I love all genres of music except hard-core metals cause I don't really understand the lyrics behind the musics. But alternative rock is the most preferable.
I've traveled every eminent tourist destinations in Bangladesh except Sundarbans. I always dream of traveling all-around the world to understand the saying "The world is a global village".
